awd_titl_txt: 1991 Gordon Research Conference on the Chemistry of         Supramolecules and Assemblies, to be Held March 4-9, 1991,  in Oxnard, California
awd_abstract_narration: This is a grant to support travel of 12 graduate students to                    the 1991 Gordon Research Conference on the Chemistry of                         Supramolecules and Assemblies, to be held March 4-9, 1991, in                   Oxnard, California.  The conference focuses on the chemistry                    and physics of organized media, such as normal and reverse                      micelles, bilayers, monolayers, polymeric surfactants, nucleic                  acids, proteins, and microemulsions.  Gordons Conferences                       provide an unusual opportunity for young scientists and                         engineers to obtain a valuable perspective on their fields and                  also to meet and talk with major researchers.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
